The Toksun Panji Coal Mine is an underground coal mine located in Toksun County, Turpan City, Xinjiang

operators: Toksun County Panji Coal Industry Company
web_search_companies.notes: The Toksun County Panji Coal Industry Company operates the mine, which is fully owned by Xinjiang Zhongtai Group.
